doc:
Jerry Zaks https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jerry_Zaks 0 Jerry Zaks (born September 7, 1946) is a German-born American stage and television director, and actor. He won the Tony Award for Best Direction of a Play and Drama Desk Award for directing The House of Blue Leaves, Lend Me a Tenor, and Six Degrees of Separation and the Tony Award for Best Direction of a Musical and Drama Desk Award for Guys and Dolls. Jerry_Zaks ( born September_7_,_1946 ) is a_German-born_American_stage_and_television_director , and actor . He won the_Tony_Award for_Best_Direction of a_Play_and_Drama_Desk_Award for directing The_House of Blue Leaves , Lend Me a_Tenor , and Six_Degrees of Separation and the_Tony_Award for_Best_Direction of a_Musical_and_Drama_Desk_Award for Guys_and_Dolls .
